footer.tool-tip: All authentication is secured and handled by Google's Firebase Authentication service. I am able to see all registered emails but NOT their passwords. Only YOU are able to reset your password.

home.header-text: {{amount}} requests have been fulfilled so far!
home.overview-card-text: Get an overview of all content requests made by you and other people.
home.my-requests-card-text: Want to see the status of your content requests or want to delete them? View a list of all your personal content requests.
home.submit-request-card-text: Can't find what you are looking for on Plex? Submit a new content request.
